PreparerPersonGrp.PreparerPersonNm: DONALD P HANCK CPA ABV CFF

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL, RECREATIONAL, AND MUNICIPAL SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL, RECREATIONAL, AND MUNICIPAL SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDES RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL, AND RECREATIONAL PROGRAMS UPON THE PLAN OR SYSTEM KNOWN AS THE CHAUTAUQUA PLAN TO LAKESIDE RESIDENTS AND GUESTS; A CHAUTAUQUA COMMUNITY OPERATING IN AFFILIATION WITH THE METHODIST CHURCH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WHEN LISTING A PROPERTY, A NOMINAL ESCROW FEE IS COLLECTED AT THE SIGNING OF THE CONTRACT WHICH IS DEPOSITED IN A SEPARATE CHECKING ACCOUNT FOR THAT PURPOSE. ON THE CLOSING OF THE SALE, THE AMOUNT IN ESCROW IS TRANSFERRED ALONG WITH THE PROCEEDS FROM THE SALE TO THE REALTY COMPANY. IF THE CONTRACT EXPIRES, THE DEPOSIT IN ESCROW IS RETURNED TO THE SELLER.

SCHEDULE D, PART X, LINE 2: THE ASSOCIATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO TAX EXAMINATIONS FOR YEARS BEFORE 2014 BY TAXING AUTHORITIES IN JURISDICTIONS WHERE THE ASSOCIATION HAS FILED RETURNS. THE ASSOCIATION DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY MATERIAL UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS UPON EVALUATION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN AND THEREFORE, THERE WAS NO MATERIAL EFFECT ON THE ASSOCIATIONS FINANCIAL CONDITION OR RESULTS OF OPERATIONS UPON ADOPTION. THE ASSOCIATION EVALUATES AT EACH BALANCE SHEET DATE UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, IF ANY, TO DETERMINE THE NEED TO RECORD LIABILITIES FOR TAXES, PENALTIES, AND INTEREST. THE ASSOCIATIONS POLICY IS TO RECORD INTEREST AND PENALTIES ON UNCERTAIN TAX PROVISIONS AS INCOME TAX EXPENSE. AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND 2017, THE ASSOCIATION HAD NO ACCRUED TAXES, INTEREST OR PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE ASSOCIATION ESTIMATES THE UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFIT WILL NOT CHANGE SIGNIFICANTLY WITHIN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OF THE LAKESIDE ASSOCIATION, PRIOR TO FILING. A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ASSOCIATION REQUIRES AN ANNUAL STATEMENT BE SIGNED BY EACH DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF LAKESIDE ASSOCIATION ANNUALLY REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION OF THE CEO BASED ON JOB PERFORMANCE AND INDUSTRY COMPENSATION TRENDS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE CEO SALARY ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
